cobblemon.species.scrachty.desc: As long as the nest of mud and thorns around its lower half is in good shape, it struts around confidently and carefree. When it's not spending time maintaining its nest, it tends to the comb on its head instead.
cobblemon.species.meansprout.name: Meansprout
cobblemon.species.meansprout.desc: Meansprout are laughably weak in battle, so they instead toy with foes psychologically, sprouting up and whispering behind their back or using vines to trip them up.
cobblemon.species.meanstalk.name: Meanstalk
cobblemon.species.meanstalk.desc: They constantly do things like covertly stealing or misplacing people's belongings or using their vines to tamper with outdoor equipment. They yield beans that are extremely bitter, said to be indicative of their true inner rage and malice.
cobblemon.species.sinistalk.name: Sinistalk
cobblemon.species.sinistalk.desc: Sinistalk are extremely cruel and tricky fighters, adept at dodging due to their highly flexible bodies. They delight in wrapping foes tightly in their thorny vines and watching them suffer. They oddly dislike bright sunlight and prefer to slowly creep and overtake objects in the shade or at night.
cobblemon.species.hoofin.name: Hoofin
cobblemon.species.wardrab.name: Wardrab
cobblemon.species.wardrab.desc: Wardrab are said to be created by spirits possessing old clothes. They tend to avoid contact with people, although their somewhat cute appearance has caused a resurgence of antique fashion trends in some places.
cobblemon.species.menasuit.name: Menasuit
cobblemon.species.menasuit.desc: Menasuit often lurk in places like abandoned houses and dark alleys. They never attack, but rather stalk people persistently and feed off of their fear and uncertainty. If you're alone and see a figure out of the corner of your eye, chances are it's a Menasuit.
cobblemon.species.dapperition.name: Dapperition
cobblemon.species.dapperition.desc: Dapperition's body is made of shadows, allowing it to move freely just about anywhere. Don't be fooled by their armless appearance. They can easily hypnotize someone using the pattern on their chest and suddenly form eerie arms to snatch them up.
cobblemon.species.plumplasm.name: Plumplasm
cobblemon.species.plumplasm.desc: Plumplasm are very messy eaters, loving any food they can get their hands on. One can see the shadow of whatever they eat through their bodies, slowly disappearing as it gets digested
cobblemon.species.phantomnom.name: Phantomnom
cobblemon.species.phantomnom.desc: Phantomnom can store many things inside their bodies, but anything that get stored becomes covered in drool. This drool is incredibly slimy and gives anyone touched by it extreme chills and a feeling of immense disgust and nausea, even if they felt perfectly fine beforehand.
cobblemon.species.germite.name: Germite
cobblemon.species.germite.desc: Germite are believed to be a particular type of germ that eventually evolved into a pokemon. They can fire off the growths on their body, coating whatever they hit in gooey slime that causes mild sickness if touched.
cobblemon.species.gastropox.name: Gastropox
cobblemon.species.gastropox.desc: They look for companionship but unfortunately spread sickness wherever they go. Their flat, mucus-coated bodies allow them to slip into many places where they're usually not wanted.
cobblemon.species.agitwin.name: Agitwin
cobblemon.species.agitwin.desc: It is made up of two separate entities that share a psychic link. Despite this, they oddly constantly act against each other in a struggle for dominance.
cobblemon.species.naeglerium.name: Naeglerium
cobblemon.species.naeglerium.desc: Naeglerium has the ability to psychically feed on thoughts and emotions. It also often acts very unpredictably. Because of these qualities, long-term exposure to Naeglerium is usually not recommended.
cobblemon.species.dicell.name: Dicell
cobblemon.species.minicule.name: Minicule
cobblemon.species.minicule.desc: A strange pokemon that can freely alter its own size. They are extremely social with their own kind, almost as if drawn to each other by some unknown force.
cobblemon.species.atomix.name: Atomix
cobblemon.species.atomix.desc: After evolution, Atomix often exhibit strange, unstable behavior such as vanishing into thin air, phasing through solid objects and even spontaneously exploding in some cases.
cobblemon.species.kwiklik.name: Kwiklik
cobblemon.species.kwiklik.desc: It was originally created as a means of transporting data across cyberspace. Since then, it unfortunately became popular with unsavory types due to its ability to slip into hard to reach places, both physical and digital.
cobblemon.species.binarray.name: Binarray
cobblemon.species.binarray.desc: Tampering from various parties caused an unexpected evolution in its code. It eats data and gives off a powerful electric shock which makes it very problematic in technology-heavy areas.
cobblemon.species.purradox.name: Purradox
cobblemon.species.purradox.desc: Purradox were originally created as an artificial domestic companion pokemon. However at some point, the data used to create them became corrupted and the project was abandoned. They eventually escaped and multiplied, exhibiting very strange and erratic behavior due to the corruption like inexplicably vanishing in an instant.
cobblemon.species.grimpire.name: Grimpire
cobblemon.species.grimpire.desc: The majority of Grimpire's hair acts as wings, easily carrying its light skinny frame. It swoops down and ensnares foes in its hair, magically draining their life force. It dislikes the sun for some reason and often hides away during the day.
cobblemon.species.volcamone.name: Volcamone
cobblemon.species.tanklang.name: Tanklang
cobblemon.species.tanklang.desc: Varitan Klink and Klang have seemingly developed the ability to join together and create Tanklang. Upon evolving, Tanklang gains a specialized cannon attachment on its right side with a yellow core. Similarly to Klinklang's red core and spiked wheel, Tanklang stores its energy in the yellow core which can then be fired from its cannon with immense power
cobblemon.species.goopipe.name: Goopipe
cobblemon.species.goopipe.desc: Its body is made of loose sludge so it seeks refuge in old bits of pipe to give it a more solid form. It is currently being investigated if it has any kind of relation to Grimer & Muk.
cobblemon.species.piplex.name: Piplex
cobblemon.species.piplex.desc: Its main body is made up of two pipe pieces that it can freely turn in different orientations. Piplex mainly live in sewers and will link up with eachother to hide themselves from maintenance workers.
cobblemon.species.sinklutter.name: Sinklutter
cobblemon.species.sinklutter.desc: Now sporting a sink, seemingly endless sludge spews forth from it. It can fire off the sludge of its body from the top faucet with enough force to dent a ship's hull.
cobblemon.species.dustout.name: Dustout
cobblemon.species.kirinirik.name: Kirinirik
cobblemon.species.kirinirik.desc: Kirinirik's lighter head prefers to approach situations calmly and analytically, while its darker head is much more brash and violent so they don't often get along. However, if Kirinirik's heads both focus their energy in tandem, they are capable of unleashing tremendous mystic power.
cobblemon.species.concealeon.name: Concealeon
cobblemon.species.concealeon.desc: It still cannot make its red stripes invisible upon evolving. However, it can now change the color of them based on its mood.
cobblemon.species.pestilint.name: Pestilint
cobblemon.species.pestilint.desc: They often live in largely populated areas, creating nests out of dust and other soft materials. These pokemon are often considered a problem because their nests can cause breathing difficulties and become a major fire hazard
cobblemon.species.carvesta.name: Carvesta
cobblemon.species.carvesta.desc: Once mistaken for Larvesta for its shape, it normally lies at the bottom of the ocean and ensnares passing prey with its tentacles. It can also propel itself backwards to skewer foes with its pointed shell
cobblemon.species.molcarona.name: Molcarona
cobblemon.species.molcarona.desc: Its shape and illuminative abilities are oddly similar to Volcarona. It appears as a hypnotically beautiful nebula in the ocean abyss as it surrounds the onlooker with its tentacles to attack
cobblemon.species.grimire.name: Grimire
cobblemon.species.grimire.desc: A creature made of mud and bones that mysteriously came to life similarly to Grimer, hence its name. Through only recently discovered, research suggests that it has actually existed before Grimer which has caused some debate over its naming.
cobblemon.species.stuk.name: Stuk
cobblemon.species.stuk.desc: Its tar-like body has seeped into the bones stuck in it which allows it to control them. It subdues prey with its clawed arm and drags them in with its other sticky arm to absorb them and add their bones to itself.
cobblemon.species.fretal.name: Fretal
cobblemon.species.fretal.desc: A forest-dwelling pokemon that for some reason searches for a flower to cover its head with. It has an extremely reclusive and meek demeanor and becomes greatly distraught if the flower is blown off of its head.
cobblemon.species.canopeace.name: Canopeace
cobblemon.species.canopeace.desc: It has a very friendly, easygoing personality that makes it a great companion for anyone. It often sits quietly to meditate and absorb sun rays with the flowers on its head which helps its long grassy hair grow.
cobblemon.species.grassola.name: Grassola
cobblemon.species.grassola.desc: It slowly moves along the forest floor, camougoomyed among old pieces of wood. It was initially mistaken for Corsola due to the way branches sprout from it
cobblemon.species.graceola.name: Graceola
cobblemon.species.graceola.desc: They normally stay very still to absorb sunlight but every year groups of them will come together and do beautiful dances to welcome the coming of spring.
cobblemon.species.severm.name: Severm
cobblemon.species.severm.desc: They like to make their homes in old stumps. Because of this, they can be dangerous to Phantump if the two meet.
cobblemon.species.infesteed.name: Infesteed
cobblemon.species.infesteed.desc: Despite their gruesome appearance, they are relatively docile worms living in old wood. The worms work in tandem to puppet the wood in a way that's still not well-known to researchers.
cobblemon.species.frankensteen.name: Frankensteen
cobblemon.species.frankensteen.desc: Most of its body is hollowed out, dead plant matter using controlled worms as hair and appendages. It uses its long, sleeve-like arms to ensnare victims and slowly suck away their life force.
cobblemon.species.sporges.name: Sporges
cobblemon.species.sporges.desc: Sporges use the sticky fungus they wear around their necks to both ensnare prey and poison it at the same time. They often have a vain attitude despite being covered in fungus most pokemon find to be repulsive.
cobblemon.species.mirrorigus.name: Mirrorigus
cobblemon.species.mirrorigus.desc: Mirrorigus appear as an ornate mirror that oddly doesn't seem to reflect its surroundings. Looking into one will show a person their ideal self. Once they are distracted, Mirrorigus springs to life and attacks with razor-sharp mirror shards.
cobblemon.species.porygon0.name: Porygon-0
cobblemon.species.porygon0.desc: Interfacing with official Silph Co. software caused it to unexpectedly evolve into this new unknown form. It seems to have stabilized but posseses the ability to spread computer viruses at will as well as an actively malicious AI.
cobblemon.species.snarlax.name: Snarlax
cobblemon.species.snarlax.desc: They are extremely bad-tempered and light sleepers. They will eat anything that comes into their territory without hesitation so they must be met with extreme caution when exploring.
cobblemon.species.lasaur.name: Lasaur
cobblemon.species.lasaur.desc: It can concentrate a weak electric charge in the crest on its head. Though this only produces minor electric attacks, it also stimulates its brain, heightening its reflexes.
cobblemon.species.lectrosaur.name: Lectrosaur
cobblemon.species.lectrosaur.desc: It can fire off powerful electrical attacks using its antenna-like horn. Massive groups of them were believed to congregate during thunderstorms in prehistoric times.
cobblemon.species.confectious.name: Confectious
cobblemon.species.confectious.desc: It is a being of discarded candy that somehow gained sentience and now roams the fairgrounds searching for more sweets to eat. It ensnares opponents in a sticky sugary goo that's nearly impossible to escape by force.
cobblemon.species.garbadjinn.name: Garbadjinn
cobblemon.species.garbadjinn.desc: The large Garbadjinn springs to life from its small trashcan to rain sickeningly-sweet junk food on foes. Despite its size, its body is light and covered in sugar that sparkles like stars.
cobblemon.species.togetect.name: Togetect
cobblemon.species.togetect.desc: It does not tolerate antagonism and will defend those it befriends with its life. Just spreading its wings and showing off its gold armor is enough to put onlookers in speechless awe.
cobblemon.species.eucuwala.name: Eucuwala
cobblemon.species.eucuwala.desc: Eucuwala spends the day collecting leaves in the forest canopy. If two Eucuwalas encounter each other, they swap leaves to taste different parts of the forest.
cobblemon.species.gulacuff.name: Gulacuff
cobblemon.species.gulacuff.desc: Gulacuff eats leaves from the trees in its territory. If it runs into another Gulacuff, it will fight, and the winner gets all the leaves the loser has collected.
cobblemon.species.timberawl.name: Timberawl
cobblemon.species.timberawl.desc: Timberawl's punch is so hard, it can knock over a large tree. It whacks trees with its large fists and collects the leaves that fall, until it has eaten its weight in foliage.
cobblemon.species.reptling.name: Reptling
cobblemon.species.reptling.desc: Reptling possesses both reptilian and avian traits. Some say that, millions of years ago, it gained its feathers and wings to survive the attacks of predators.
cobblemon.species.rapteror.name: Rapteror
cobblemon.species.rapteror.desc: Rapteror circles its foe from the sky, and strikes when the enemy is looking away. Its body is made of tightly packed foliage, so it is very light and can make amazing maneuvers in the air.
cobblemon.species.velosaur.name: Velosaur
cobblemon.species.velosaur.desc: Velosaur's wings and scales are made from tough bark that is hard enough to protect it, but light enough to allow it to fly. The scales on Velosaur's back resemble the markings on many poisonous plants near its nesting grounds.
cobblemon.species.yetini.name: Yetini
cobblemon.species.yeteen.name: Yeteen
cobblemon.species.yetitan.name: Yetitan
cobblemon.species.yetitan.desc: 41 Crystal Defense Ice 44 Giga DrainSTAB Grass 47 Roar Normal 51 Ice HammerSTAB Ice 58 Wood HammerSTAB Grass
cobblemon.species.kindlemur.name: Kindlemur
cobblemon.species.kindlemur.desc: Kindlemur swings through the trees searching for dead wood, which it uses to make large fires on the ground. It does this to keep itself warm at night.
cobblemon.species.burmurly.name: Burmurly
cobblemon.species.burmurly.desc: Burmurly swings though the trees with such speed that it has been nicknamed 'the Flaming Flash'. It's very careful not to set the branches from which it swings aflame.
cobblemon.species.merculey.name: Merculey
cobblemon.species.merculey.desc: Merculey's body is filled with a hot acid that makes it very light. It is able to flip and spin to dodge enemy attacks, but it can also use the liquid for hot acid attacks.
cobblemon.species.woolvry.name: Woolvry
cobblemon.species.woolvry.desc: Woolvry has a scarf around its body which keeps its body warm to make fire come out. If the scarf is removed it will die.
cobblemon.species.clokruel.name: Clokruel
cobblemon.species.smoldrine.name: Smoldrine
cobblemon.species.smoldrine.desc: It has thick bands of hair wrapped around its body for protection. It can be vicious and dangerous in the wild, but it is rarely seen outside of captivity.
cobblemon.species.batorch.name: Batorch
cobblemon.species.batrix.name: Batrix
cobblemon.species.vamfire.name: Vamfire
cobblemon.species.vamfire.desc: Lash Out Dark Blast BurnSTAB Fire Burning JealousySTAB Fire Fire PledgeSTAB Fire Heat WaveSTAB Fire Dual Wingbeat Flying Scorching Sands Ground Endeavor Normal Snore Normal Uproar Normal Iron Defense Steel Steel BeamSTAB Steel Steel RollerSTAB Steel U-turn Bug X-Scissor Bug Brutal Swing Dark Nasty Plot Dark Thief Dark Dragon Claw Dragon Charge Beam Electric Thunder Electric Thunderbolt Electric Thunder Wave Electric Cuddle Fairy Brick Break Fighting Focus Blast Fighting Rock Smash Fighting Fire BlastSTAB Fire FlamethrowerSTAB Fire Sunny Day Fire Acrobatics Flying Aerial Ace Flying Shadow Ball Ghost Solar Beam Grass Bulldoze Ground Dig Ground Earthquake Ground Landslide Ground Attract Normal Confide Normal Cut Normal Double Team Normal Double-Edge Normal Facade Normal Frustration Normal Giga Impact Normal Heartfelt Pulse Normal Hidden Power Normal Hyper Beam Normal Protect Normal Return Normal Round Normal Safeguard Normal Sleep Talk Normal Strength Normal Substitute Normal Swagger Normal Swords Dance Normal Work Up Normal Toxic Poison Psyshock Psychic Rest Psychic Rock Slide Rock Rock Tomb Rock Sandstorm Rock Stone Edge Rock Gyro BallSTAB Steel
cobblemon.species.dimetrus.name: Dimetrus
cobblemon.species.dimetrus.desc: Dimetrus uses its large fin to catch currents in the ocean. It can travel many miles using very little energy by doing this, but it is very slow on land.
cobblemon.species.permidon.name: Permidon
cobblemon.species.permidon.desc: Permidon has large fins on its arms which it uses to swim upstream. Permidon can do amazing tricks underwater, but on land it is very slow.
cobblemon.species.lividon.name: Lividon
cobblemon.species.lividon.desc: Lividon is known for its bad temper. It often sleeps on the ocean floor, and if it is awoken it will become furious and attack anything in the area.
cobblemon.species.liqueel.name: Liqueel
cobblemon.species.liqueel.desc: Liqueel's long tail whips through the water as it swims, making it very fast. Some Liqueel use their tails to fight while trying to protect others.
cobblemon.species.electeel.name: Electeel
cobblemon.species.electeel.desc: The electrical current that runs through its body is very powerful. When in danger, Electeel load electricity into their dorsal fins, then discharge it as a powerful shock wave.
cobblemon.species.emporeel.name: Emporeel
cobblemon.species.emporeel.desc: Emporeel's body is so long that when it walks on land, it curls up into very tight coils, which they also do when preparing to launch an electrical attack. The longer the Emporeel, the more powerful its electricity is.
cobblemon.species.lochsea.name: Lochsea
cobblemon.species.nesshoal.name: Nesshoal
cobblemon.species.psyren.name: Psyren
cobblemon.species.aromutt.name: Aromutt
cobblemon.species.aromutt.desc: Aromutt has an amazing sense of smell that lets it seek out lost people and things. It is known as the Domestic Pokemon because it can only be found in captivity. It only lives with humans in cities and towns.
cobblemon.species.odorog.name: Odorog
cobblemon.species.odorog.desc: Odorog has such an amazing sense of smell that it can always smell its way home, hence it never gets lost. It is said that once Odorog smells you, it can track you down anywhere within a 200 mile-radius (320 kilometer-radius).
cobblemon.species.chinchul.name: Chinchul
cobblemon.species.chinchul.desc: Chinchul is treasured by many trainers because of its soft fur, so the softer the fur, the more desired the Chinchul. Even some trainers give it food for its soft fur.
cobblemon.species.chilleap.name: Chilleap
cobblemon.species.chilleap.desc: Though Chilleap's bushy tail is made of fur, it packs a powerful punch. The tail is both thick and heavy, so using the leverage Chilleap gets from its body, it can knock out a foe.
cobblemon.species.chiquail.name: Chiquail
cobblemon.species.chiquail.desc: Chiquail uses the feather on its head to feel which way the wind is blowing. It cannot fly very well but if it catches the wind just right it can sashay into the sky.
cobblemon.species.mavriquail.name: Mavriquail
cobblemon.species.mavriquail.desc: Mavriquail glides through the air with amazing precision by using the feather on its head. From 100 feet in the air it can land on a twig going at top speeds.
cobblemon.species.jayzul.name: Jayzul
cobblemon.species.jayzul.desc: Jayzul's song is very beautiful, so they are loved by many Trainers. They make their nests in trees along paths and pick up crumbs left behind by wandering adventurers.
cobblemon.species.jayzure.name: Jayzure
cobblemon.species.jayzure.desc: Jayzure's blue feathers help it blend into the sky so that it can sneak up on its prey. It also often sneaks up on trainers passing through its territory and pecks them until they leave. It is very aggressive, especially if it's protecting its eggs.
cobblemon.species.hoppiler.name: Hoppiler
cobblemon.species.hoppiler.desc: Hoppiler can jump very high because of its powerful legs. This enables it to escape many foes and breed plentifully.
cobblemon.species.cobworm.name: Cobworm
cobblemon.species.cobworm.desc: When Hoppiler gets caught in a web, it evolves into a form with a hard outer shell to protect itself. Cobworm uses the net as a thick shield against attacking Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.hoppereign.name: Hoppereign
cobblemon.species.hoppereign.desc: Hoppereign has extremely powerful legs, which allow it to spring into the air at any moment, where it can then glide using its large wings. A hard shell covers its body and protects it from many harsh physical attacks.
cobblemon.species.rollip.name: Rollip
cobblemon.species.rollip.desc: Rollip can roll up into a tight ball. It uses this ability to attack and defend itself. Though it is slow on foot, it can roll very fast as a ball.
cobblemon.species.rollipod.name: Rollipod
cobblemon.species.rollipod.desc: Rollipod is curled up into a ball. Its body is changing and growing stronger. When it gets strong enough it will open back up and evolve.
cobblemon.species.isopanzer.name: Isopanzer
cobblemon.species.isopanzer.desc: Evo Barrage Normal - Defense Curl Normal - Scuttle HopSTAB Bug - Bug BiteSTAB Bug - Tackle Normal - PinchSTAB Bug - Harden Normal - Quick Attack Normal - Lock-On Normal - Mud Bomb Ground - Mud Shot Ground 11 Thread LashSTAB Bug 15 Bide Normal 19 Barrage Normal 23 Struggle BugSTAB Bug 29 Iron Defense Steel 32 SteamrollerSTAB Bug 35 Focus Energy Normal 38 Gyro BallSTAB Steel 42 Rolling Press Fighting 45 Rebound StrikeSTAB Steel 49 Leech LifeSTAB Bug 54 Flash CannonSTAB Steel 59 Zap Cannon Electric
cobblemon.species.ploworm.name: Ploworm
cobblemon.species.ploworm.desc: Ploworm digs through the soil underground using the large tooth on its head. It is more commonly seen during the rainy season because it dislikes the wet soil. It has also been spotted in...
cobblemon.species.lumbrill.name: Lumbrill
cobblemon.species.lumbrill.desc: Lumbrill digs through thick layers of stone underground. Its hard steel body protects it from intense pressure and magma streams that it may run into. It is often used by treasure hunters...
cobblemon.species.baybolt.name: Baybolt
cobblemon.species.baybolt.desc: Baybolt lives in the canopy of the Junnin trees. In certain areas it has become the cause of forest fires because it sometimes attracts lightning, which strikes the trees around it.
cobblemon.species.bolteen.name: Bolteen
cobblemon.species.bolteen.desc: Bolteen's ears build up and store electricity, which it then uses for powerful attacks. Small amounts of the stored electricity is also spread through Bolteen's body while it swings through trees.
cobblemon.species.dandyseed.name: Dandyseed
cobblemon.species.dandyseed.desc: Dandyseed is so light it is almost always being carried by the wind. It only stops when it lands and sticks into the ground.
cobblemon.species.dandylie.name: Dandylie
cobblemon.species.dandylie.desc: It is known as the weed Pokemon because after one Dandylie is seen, others start to appear all over in the area. The large buds on its hands and tail are good for physical attacks.
cobblemon.species.withereen.name: Withereen
cobblemon.species.withereen.desc: When the wind blows, seeds fall from Withereen's dried gray body. Some say a wish is granted every time Withereen's seeds are blown into the air.
cobblemon.species.quartzac.name: Quartzac
cobblemon.species.quartzac.desc: Quartzac has a shiny, almost transparent body composed completely of quartz. There are several different colours of Quartzac made from different types of quartz.
cobblemon.species.equazar.name: Equazar
cobblemon.species.equazar.desc: Equazar refracts light in its body causing its enemy to become confused. It can also equalize the light to make itself shine brightly.
cobblemon.species.campyre.name: Campyre
cobblemon.species.campyre.desc: Campyres typically are born from a trainer burning a special type of wood. They love to provide warmth to others and are generally very well-mannered when looked over regularly.
cobblemon.species.wildyre.name: Wildyre
cobblemon.species.wildyre.desc: Campyres typically grow out of control when left unattended, thus causing an evolution into Wildyre. Wildyre are much more fierce and chaotic than their previous evolution, and only want to spread flame.
cobblemon.species.bloatick.name: Bloatick
cobblemon.species.bloatick.desc: Bloatick sucks the energy from its foe until it is blown up like a balloon. It can either use the energy to heal itself, or send back a powerful attack.
cobblemon.species.suckeeto.name: Suckeeto
cobblemon.species.suckeeto.desc: Suckeeto has a large needle on its face which it uses to drain the energy from its enemies. It also sucks the nutrients from trees when it is deep in the forest.
cobblemon.species.stalad.name: Stalad
cobblemon.species.stelimight.name: Stelimight
cobblemon.species.cavernight.name: Cavernight
cobblemon.species.sandstrum.name: Sandstrum
cobblemon.species.sandstrum.desc: Sandstrum hides under the sand on the beach. Trainers sometimes step on it and are surprised when the ground starts to move from under their feet.
cobblemon.species.sanderon.name: Sanderon
cobblemon.species.sanderon.desc: Sanderon's body is made of hard compacted sand. It often sleeps under the sand on a beach and and waits for unsuspecting people or Pokemon to step on its large horn.
cobblemon.species.shoreking.name: Shoreking
cobblemon.species.antini.name: Antini
cobblemon.species.insignel.name: Insignel
cobblemon.species.stagnel.name: Stagnel
cobblemon.species.stagnel.desc: There have been many sightings of Stagnel gathered in the deserts in large quantities, standing still and looking up at the sky. It's completely unknown why they do this.
cobblemon.species.buffhilla.name: Buffhilla
cobblemon.species.buffhilla.desc: Slow and peaceful, Buffhila spend their lives ruminating on the foot hills and fields below large mountains. They stay in groups and protect weaker siblings with their rock hard bodies.
cobblemon.species.bisommit.name: Bisommit
cobblemon.species.bisommit.desc: Easily spooked, their thunderous hooves on the plain can be heard from miles off. Many believe that Bisommit has a connection to the mountains and can cause earthquakes.
cobblemon.species.coyoco.name: Coyoco
cobblemon.species.coyoco.desc: When Coyoco howl, their body compresses and fire spews from their mouth. Its body acts as a bag coated with a fireproof lining filled with hot coals.
cobblemon.species.stuckarp.name: Stuckarp
cobblemon.species.stuckarp.desc: Stuckarp fastens itself to rocks and other objects by using its suction cup mouth. Its hold is so strong that it can stick to a surface for several days.
cobblemon.species.stuckry.name: Stuckry
cobblemon.species.stuckry.desc: Stuckry's flat body has tiny suction cups that allow it to stick to any surface. If in danger, Stuckry will lay flat and protect itself with its hard plated back.
cobblemon.species.plubus.name: Plubus
cobblemon.species.plubus.desc: Because it lives in dark cave water, Publus has no eyes. It can feel vibrations to make its way through the caverns while searching for food.
cobblemon.species.salamink.name: Salamink
cobblemon.species.salamink.desc: Salamink uses the gills on its side to feel the flow of water so it can navigate its way through dark cave water. It is sometimes seen in deep parts of the ocean.
cobblemon.species.frostoss.name: Frostoss
cobblemon.species.frostoss.desc: Frostoss loves to throw snowballs. It has an amazing aim, which is unfortunate for people or Pokemon passing by, but it only does this for fun and never gets mad.
cobblemon.species.kaboo.name: Kaboo
cobblemon.species.kaboo.desc: A grenade Pokemon who mourns the death from past battles at battle grounds.
cobblemon.species.membry.name: Membry
cobblemon.species.fawntia.name: Fawntia
cobblemon.species.reindolph.name: Reindolph
cobblemon.species.reindolph.desc: Reindolph can fly through the air for short distances. No one knows how it can do this, but some suspect it has to do with its crystal hooves.
cobblemon.species.bansheet.name: Bansheet
cobblemon.species.bansheet.desc: Bansheet resembles a sheet. If someone were to lift it, there would be nothing underneath. It was first spotted in the workshop of a tailor.
cobblemon.species.teepolter.name: Teepolter
cobblemon.species.hoodloom.name: Hoodloom
cobblemon.species.hoodloom.desc: Hoodloom typically hides in dark alleyways, and always looking for stuff to loot. They don't like working together, but will team up if it needs to.
cobblemon.species.cloacover.name: Cloacover
cobblemon.species.cloacover.desc: Cloacover are a preferred Pokemon amongst criminal organizations due to their innate evilness. They command Hoodloom, making them collect all sorts of shiny objects in exchange for poffins.
cobblemon.species.indascent.name: Indascent
cobblemon.species.lamplume.name: Lamplume
cobblemon.species.bottoil.name: Bottoil
cobblemon.species.cuncoldron.name: Cuncoldron
cobblemon.species.tarift.name: Tarift
cobblemon.species.tarift.desc: It was believed that Tarift was a different Pokemon millions of years ago, but got stuck in the tar pits and turned into what it is today. Its body is composed mainly of a thick tar that absorbs physical attacks quite well.
cobblemon.species.tarzorus.name: Tarzorus
cobblemon.species.tarzorus.desc: Tarzorus lives deep in tar pits and rarely comes up unless it is disturbed. Legend says it used to be a land dwelling Pokemon that sunk into the tar pits and transformed.
cobblemon.species.tuttby.name: Tuttby
cobblemon.species.tuttby.desc: Tuttby has two dots on its head that act as eyes. Some say the eyes can see into the afterlife and allow it to communicate with passed spirits.
cobblemon.species.whiscleo.name: Whiscleo
cobblemon.species.whiscleo.desc: Whiscleo has large ears that can hear from many miles away. Ancient writings say that it can hear the voices of the past and future as well.
cobblemon.species.pharoar.name: Pharoar
cobblemon.species.pharoar.desc: Pharoar is known as the king of the desert. Ancient writings say it once controlled human beings, who would build giant shrines in honour of their master.
cobblemon.species.equia.name: Equia
cobblemon.species.treiarch.name: Treiarch
cobblemon.species.andromini.name: Andromini
cobblemon.species.smettle.name: Smettle
cobblemon.species.smettle.desc: Smettle is a mischievous Pokemon. It likes to use its quills to make fun of other Pokemon, which doesn't attract it friends.
cobblemon.species.smyucca.name: Smyucca
cobblemon.species.smyucca.desc: Smyucca has a very aggressive temperament. It is strongly forbidden to rub against its sharp spines.
cobblemon.species.demonagave.name: Demonagave
cobblemon.species.demonagave.desc: Demonagave's body is entirely covered by spines. Its Needle Arm is often fatal.
cobblemon.species.pachyball.name: Pachyball
cobblemon.species.pachyball.desc: When Pachyball sneezes, sprays of magma come out of its trunk, burning everything in their path. Before falling asleep, it rolls itself into a ball to keep its body warm, which earned it its name.
cobblemon.species.pachyndou.name: Pachyndou
cobblemon.species.pachyndou.desc: Pachyndou's psychic powers and bright colors are an excellent protection against potential predators. When it feels threatened, smoke comes out of the hole on its head.
cobblemon.species.pachyvory.name: Pachyvory
cobblemon.species.pachyvory.desc: Pachyvory's tusks are very resistant. When they become too big, it melts the end with its fiery breath.
cobblemon.species.squini.name: Squini
cobblemon.species.squini.desc: The harpoon-shaped cap on Squini's head can be illuminated so that it is not lost from sight by its fellows. It emits less and less light as it gets ready to evolve.
cobblemon.species.squinja.name: Squinja
cobblemon.species.squinja.desc: Squinja is a fast and accurate fighter. It generally prefers to keep its enemies at a distance, but is quite capable of close combat.
cobblemon.species.squartial.name: Squartial
cobblemon.species.squartial.desc: Squartial never takes rash risks. Each of its moves is well thought out. Contrary to its pre-evolutions, it is relatively solitary.
cobblemon.species.wormini.name: Wormini
cobblemon.species.wormini.desc: Wormini spends its time digging in the ground and rarely sees the light of day.
cobblemon.species.wormeel.name: Wormeel
cobblemon.species.wormeel.desc: Wormini spends its time digging in the ground and rarely sees the light of day.
cobblemon.species.malarva.name: Malarva
cobblemon.species.malarva.desc: Malarva is a parasite that likes to settle on large Pokemon to feed on their blood. It is said that the first strains of the Pokerus were found on this Pokemon and that it is the cause of its propagation.
cobblemon.species.mosdeng.name: Mosdeng
cobblemon.species.mosdeng.desc: Mosdeng lives in wetlands and attacks in packs, which makes it more dangerous. However, it remains very vulnerable to Swellow which make it one of their favorite meals.
cobblemon.species.mosboom.name: Mosboom
cobblemon.species.mosboom.desc: Mosboom is able to explode in the face of predators to protect its offspring as soon as the need arises. When it stings its preys, it inoculates a very powerful poison capable of making a Ursaring fall in 5 seconds.
cobblemon.species.antager.name: Antager
cobblemon.species.antager.desc: Antager is small but don't be fooled by appearances, it can lift up to 50 times its weight.
cobblemon.species.antoldier.name: Antoldier
cobblemon.species.antoldier.desc: Antoldier have an extraordinary power, they can lift a Snorlax without any efforts. They are used in mines to help humans.
cobblemon.species.hamerry.name: Hamerry
cobblemon.species.hamerry.desc: Hamerry is a very popular Pokemon among children. Its cheeks give off a sweet smell, and give it a very friendly look.
cobblemon.species.hamysos.name: Hamysos
cobblemon.species.hamysos.desc: Hamysos is a festive Pokemon. It is said that its cheeks are actually large Ceriz berries, and that tasting them causes a euphoric state.
cobblemon.species.goatanaa.name: Goatanaa
cobblemon.species.goatanaa.desc: Goatanaa lives in the mountains. It moves according to the weather, when it is hot, it seeks the coolness in the heights and when the winter arrives, it goes down in the valleys.
cobblemon.species.goaturly.name: Goaturly
cobblemon.species.goaturly.desc: Goaturly is bred for its precious wool, which is both soft and resistant. It is used to make rich clothes. It is in perpetual conflict with Frison because of their ego.
cobblemon.species.pomara.name: Pomara
cobblemon.species.pomara.desc: Pomara live near lakes and rivers. They like to gather to parade at the water's edge.
cobblemon.species.dashean.name: Dashean
cobblemon.species.dashean.desc: Dashean is a sea horse. It is able to gallop on the water at impressive speeds.
cobblemon.species.boonny.name: Boonny
cobblemon.species.boonny.desc: Boonny's body is essentially made of meteorite, which does not prevent it from jumping extremely high.
cobblemon.species.rabball.name: Rabball
cobblemon.species.rabball.desc: After evolution, this Pokemon is enclosed in a meteoric shell. It is able to resist the trampling of a horde of Tauros.
cobblemon.species.lagorite.name: Lagorite
cobblemon.species.lagorite.desc: Lagorite uses its arms as both a shield and a sharp blade. A Meteor Mash from this Pokemon knocks out a Rhydon
cobblemon.species.llampas.name: Llampas
cobblemon.species.llampas.desc: Llampas are cheerful Pokemon with carefree attitudes, which makes them a common choice for new trainers. Although, the Pollen from their fur is especially strong, causing anyone nearby to sneeze violently.
cobblemon.species.danfluff.name: Danfluff
cobblemon.species.danfluff.desc: Danfluff aren't particularly bright, but they are devoted to their trainer. With a single command, they can spread out thousands of pollen spores with one swipe of their tail, causing entire Pollen Storms all on their own.
cobblemon.species.alfalphalops.name: Alfalphalops
cobblemon.species.alfalphalops.desc: The rocky hump on the back of an Alfalphalops can hold nearly a hundred of gallons of water. These special humps allow both them and their lucky trainers to endure even the most extreme of weather conditions.
cobblemon.species.therpal.name: Therpal
cobblemon.species.therpal.desc: The fluid visible in a Therpal's chest is a heated mixture of gases and oil. This allows them to travel at incredible speeds for short bursts, but due to their small size, they have to make frequent stops to make sure they don't run dry.
cobblemon.species.aspfault.name: Aspfault
cobblemon.species.aspfault.desc: Aspfault are highly social creatures. They often use their high body heat to drill through solid rock and stone, creating large tunnel networks inhabited by scores of Therpal and Asfault.
cobblemon.species.tarmendoa.name: Tarmendoa
cobblemon.species.tarmendoa.desc: Tarmendoa's glowing underside and breakneck speeds cause it look like little more than a blur of flame at night. Children often make wishes when they seem them, mistaking a Tarmendoa for a shooting star.
cobblemon.species.burbwhirl.name: Burbwhirl
cobblemon.species.burbwhirl.desc: A Burbwhirl's bubble can be used as a gauge for their emotions. Normally their bubble is rather small, but when they're out exploring the world, their bubble will expand with child-like wonder. However, if a Burbwhirl is frightened, its bubble will pop.
cobblemon.species.spoutlaw.name: Spoutlaw
cobblemon.species.spoutlaw.desc: When in battle, Spoutlaw will motionlessly stare down their opponent, hands hovering over the water pouches on their hips. At the slightest noise, Spoutlaw will lash out and shoot water from its pouches at blinding speeds.
cobblemon.species.vaquamael.name: Vaquamael
cobblemon.species.vaquamael.desc: Vaquamael are natural leaders and are often seen protecting other Pokemon. When someone is out causing trouble, a Vaquamael will rush to catch them using its powerful water lasso.
cobblemon.species.chewmunk.name: Chewmunk
cobblemon.species.chewmunk.desc: Chewmunk are prolific enough to have established a firm population in Kaskade's cities. Their friendly attitude towards people is a trait of a desirable pet, but their need to constantly shave their teeth by chewing makes them difficult pets.
cobblemon.species.cheekat.name: Cheekat
cobblemon.species.cheekat.desc: Cheekat isn't able evolve in the wild, so it's thought that they chose a feline form to be better suited for humans. This seems to have worked, as Cheekat are often used for their hypnotic abilities by those with insomnia.
cobblemon.species.specoey.name: Specoey
cobblemon.species.specoey.desc: Specoey are trained in acting from a young age. Due to this lifelong ability, they often partake in stage plays alongside young children. In some cases, the audience is unable to tell the difference.
cobblemon.species.opakespiel.name: Opakespiel
cobblemon.species.opakespiel.desc: Opakespiel are known for their constant ramblings and monologuing. But when the situation calls for it, an Opakespiel can stop its pulse and play dead for up to a month at a time.
cobblemon.species.kwaile.name: Kwaile
cobblemon.species.kwaile.desc: Scared of everything and often abandoned by their parents, young Kwaile will band together in militant groups. These groups often hunt young Sighlo and Sewaddle to showcase their superiority, but it rarely ever goes their way.
cobblemon.species.quailert.name: Quailert
cobblemon.species.quailert.desc: The need to protect its young is always on its mind. It digs holes and then covers Kwaile with its large wings.
cobblemon.species.quailstion.name: Quailstion
cobblemon.species.quailstion.desc: Its wings are caked with dirt and mud. When it comes to the ground, they combine their wings with the earth below them, creating a very strong barrier.
cobblemon.species.sighlo.name: Sighlo
cobblemon.species.sighlo.desc: It does almost nothing aside from sitting and eating all day. Easily eating its body weight in a sitting. It lets out an occasional sigh from loneliness.
cobblemon.species.cooreds.name: Cooreds
cobblemon.species.cooreds.desc: Like its previous evolution, it is pretty immobile. While waiting to evolve again, it practices making noises with its trumpet-like mouth.
cobblemon.species.probaska.name: Probaska
cobblemon.species.probaska.desc: After evolution, Probaska becomes upbeat and energetic. They are known to have large parties in some forests at night.
cobblemon.species.histameanie.name: Histameanie
cobblemon.species.histameanie.desc: Histameanie are infamous for hiding in tall grass and attacking unsuspecting passerby. Due to this, it is uncommon to see a trainer in Kaskade without a repel.
cobblemon.species.apheed.name: Apheed
cobblemon.species.apheed.desc: Apheed like to eat fruits and other plants together in a large swarm from the inside out. In the summer, berry farmers are very wary of Apheed.
cobblemon.species.musleafo.name: Musleafo
cobblemon.species.musleafo.desc: Musleafo are most common in the spring and summer, always on the hunt for more and more sweet nectar. They like to hunt together, although loners are not unheard of.
cobblemon.species.eecroach.name: Eecroach
cobblemon.species.eecroach.desc: Eeroach like to go in cities and disguise themselves as weeds in between sidewalks, they look for any sugary foods Pokemon or Humans leave behind.
cobblemon.species.swarm_eecroach.name: Eecroach
cobblemon.species.clamtrip.name: Clamtrip
cobblemon.species.clamtrip.desc: Being attracted to shiny objects, Clamtrip often fight among themselves, trying to steal the others pearls. Clamperl are their favorite prey.
cobblemon.species.rowviar.name: Rowviar
cobblemon.species.rowviar.desc: These small Pokemon travel in schools of 12 and tend to swim in a V formation. When one evolves into Sanook, they leave their colony to start a new one.
cobblemon.species.sanook.name: Sanook
cobblemon.species.sanook.desc: Sanook have immensely strong jaws that rival Pokemon such as Drednaw. Their beaks grow sharper with age, making elder Sanook the most powerful in their colony.
cobblemon.species.tofrug.name: Tofrug
cobblemon.species.kaskazog.name: Kaskazog
cobblemon.species.ananot.name: Ananot
cobblemon.species.ananot.desc: Ananots have a sticky mucus that smells like that of ripe Nanab berries. Although this mucus is inherently toxic, when properly processed they can be used for medicinal purposes.
cobblemon.species.ananoop.name: Ananoop
cobblemon.species.ananoop.desc: Ananoop are commonly mistaken for ripe fruit by tourists, though if touched have a gooey toxin so powerful it could cause temporary paralysis lasting several hours.
cobblemon.species.mosster.name: Mosster
cobblemon.species.mosster.desc: Mosster like to lay on roofs, using its fur to plant itself between the shingles. Large colonies of Mosster can form if not checked regularly.
cobblemon.species.mosskrat.name: Mosskrat
cobblemon.species.mosskrat.desc: Mosskrat run around in small packs, they choose the leader by who has the longest tail, although some packs follow alternate colored Mosskrat.
cobblemon.species.catteraxe.name: Catteraxe
cobblemon.species.catteraxe.desc: Catteraxe swing their axe like tail to clear anything in it's path. They are wild and uncontrollable pokemon, although many older women have a fondness for it.
cobblemon.species.catatomb.name: Catatomb
cobblemon.species.enigmeon.name: Enigmeon
cobblemon.species.enigmeon.desc: The origins of this Pokemon remain shrouded in mystery. While it evolves from the use of a Mist Stone, there is no record of Enigmeon existing at any point in the past.
cobblemon.species.desoray.name: Desoray
cobblemon.species.desoray.desc: With their whip like tail, they can attack with intense speed and power. They like to hide in the sand, using it as camouflage to catch their prey.
cobblemon.species.pudet.name: Pudet
cobblemon.species.pudet.desc: Pudet are very friendly pokemon, commonly kept as family pets. They will not hesitate to protect the ones it loves, even if it isn't strong enough to handle many threats.
cobblemon.species.woond.name: Woond
cobblemon.species.woond.desc: Back before the current era, a group of Woond saved many Kaskadian, Alolan, and Unovian soldiers in the Continental War. They are known for their bravery and intense perseverance.
cobblemon.species.pramblo.name: Pramblo
cobblemon.species.pramblo.desc: This Pokemon has a tube of hot glass coming off of its protective shell. This tube is formed from the glass leftover after the shell’s formation. Pramblo use it to interact with the outside world.
cobblemon.species.glashulimp.name: Glashulimp
cobblemon.species.drout.name: Drout
cobblemon.species.drout.desc: Drout is regarded as an ancestor to Sanook, although scientists are unsure of how both pokemon can co-exist in the same time period. They have weak lungs but choose to breathe through their gills.
cobblemon.species.dry_drout.name: Drout
cobblemon.species.guruchi.name: Guruchi
cobblemon.species.guruchi.desc: Guruchi have turbine-like tails which they use to process and condense water. This processed water can be shot at incredibly fast rates through the gap between its teeth, allowing Guruchi to cut wood with ease.
cobblemon.species.porygonomega.name: Porygon-Omega
cobblemon.species.estoe.name: Estoe
cobblemon.species.estoe.desc: Some say this Pokemon originated from another plane of existence. Lingering in its presence is considered dangerous due to the strange, cell altering energy it emits.
cobblemon.species.perpetua.name: Perpetua
cobblemon.species.perpetua.desc: As mysterious as Perpetua is, several high influencing leaders in history have shown odd favoritism for this Pokemon. It can emit a strange light from its frills.
cobblemon.species.tooburm.name: Tooburm
cobblemon.species.tooburm.desc: Tooburm are rarely seen above ground, choosing to eat potatoes and stay hidden. They have very weak electric type attacks that are launched from their prongs.
cobblemon.species.detrarc.name: Detrarc
cobblemon.species.detrarc.desc: The potato around Detrarc's neck is mature enough to appear to be fully grown. Farmers sometimes grab Detrarc up and get shocked as a result of it.
cobblemon.species.qayagus.name: Qayagus
cobblemon.species.auditaur.name: Auditaur
cobblemon.species.auditaur.desc: It's said that if an Auditaur begins to sing while you pet it, you'll receive many years of good luck. Its voice is very soft and used to calm small children down.
cobblemon.species.oxillery.name: Oxillery
cobblemon.species.oxillery.desc: Oxillery are among the loudest Pokemon ever recorded, although they prefer to replicate the noises they hear through their sensitive horns.
cobblemon.species.mienflux.name: Mienflux
cobblemon.species.gneckle.name: Gneckle
cobblemon.species.gneckle.desc: Gneckle are too weak to completely leave their shell, leaving them in a mostly immobile state. Female Rabyoose will do anything to protect a newborn Gneckle.
cobblemon.species.rabyoose.name: Rabyoose
cobblemon.species.rabyoose.desc: Most wild Rabyoose have no interest in humans or other Pokemon, making them hostile to anyone not of their kind. Rabyoose are known to aggressively charge at others in their pack to assert dominance.
cobblemon.species.tamroast.name: Tamroast
cobblemon.species.vitisquash.name: Vitisquash
cobblemon.species.vitisquash.desc: Vitisquash use their large feet to squish grapes it grows with fellow farmers. No one knows where they came from, just that they are gentle souls.
cobblemon.species.dionysseur.name: Dionysseur
cobblemon.species.umbralu.name: Umbralu
cobblemon.species.umbralu.desc: Umbralu have a dark aura in their underskirt that is pitch black and impossible to see through. Strong Unbralu can concentrate this energy to shoot beams of darkness that leach the opponent’s life force.
cobblemon.species.nomobjeka.name: Nomobjeka
cobblemon.species.nomobjeka.desc: The existence of Nomobjeka, a fun-loving guardian Pokemon, was just recently proven. It goes out in search of fainted wild Pokemon and guards them until they recover. These Pokemon can only be found in hidden areas shrouded by foliage, making them a rare sight in the wild.
cobblemon.species.kleptarak.name: Kleptarak
cobblemon.species.kleptarak.desc: These menacing Pokemon use their long legs and hand-like tail to rapidly climb in ways that defy gravity. Kleptarak are notorious for stalking their prey at night and snatching them into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.kituff.name: Kituff
cobblemon.species.beadamup.name: Beadamup
cobblemon.species.rascoom.name: Rascoom
cobblemon.species.faebril.name: Faebril
cobblemon.species.faebril.desc: By touching a pokemon or human with their wings, they can send healing pulses through them. They also are very strong defibrillator, even being able to start the heart of Wailord.
cobblemon.species.botnyak.name: Botnyak
cobblemon.species.botnyak.desc: Originally created by Tom Bezzle as a companion Pokemon, Botnyak were engineered to be extremely marketable. When the product flopped, Botnyak were repurposed by Amaze-All for other projects.
cobblemon.species.vendrom.name: Vendrom
cobblemon.species.buwuve.name: Buwuve
cobblemon.species.wasgrowl.name: Wasgrowl
cobblemon.species.worcane.name: Worcane
cobblemon.species.worcane.desc: This Pokemon is notoriously hard to train, but very rewarding when done right. Worcane are the alpha of the ocean, leading Pokemon on their team to victory.
cobblemon.species.probat.name: Probat
cobblemon.species.jemineye.name: Jemineye
cobblemon.species.jemineye.desc: Under the water, nothing is more aware than Jemineye. It always sees through its gem like eyes, even while it rests, it always is ready to escape.
cobblemon.species.oracub.name: Oracub
cobblemon.species.bearvoyance.name: Bearvoyance
cobblemon.species.bearvoyance.desc: Bearvoyance can use their psychic abilities to wisely predict their foe’s next move. Elder Bearvoyance love to work at daycares, giving words of wisdom to Pokemon while they’re still in eggs.
cobblemon.species.folleming.name: Folleming
cobblemon.species.folleming.desc: Follemings are mind controlled by the leader Folleming to do things against their will. When a Folleming is strong enough to resist the leader’s mental commands, they will overthrow the current leader.
cobblemon.species.drosabell.name: Drosabell
cobblemon.species.drosabell.desc: Kaskadian Bellsprout who study on Spectoul Mountain awaken their true psychic abilities, evolving into Drosabell. They can force their presence into any creatures mind, normally using this ability to eat any weak pokemon around.
cobblemon.species.yanmage.name: Yanmage
cobblemon.species.bloomage.name: Bloomage
cobblemon.species.bloomage.desc: Shooting fireballs everywhere, they are known for causing trouble and chaos wherever they run to.
cobblemon.species.obsidious.name: Obsidious
cobblemon.species.mercryni.name: Mercryni
cobblemon.species.mercryni.desc: When startled, Mercryni cry tears of mercury. Its sharp spikes are corroded and rusty. Touching the spikes or tears of a Mercryni may result in hospitalization.
cobblemon.species.meraculisk.name: Meraculisk
cobblemon.species.meraculisk.desc: This Pokemon has gone under rigorous training to overcome even it's darkest fears and has mastered the manipulation of it's poison.
cobblemon.species.golgre.name: Golgre
cobblemon.species.prospectre.name: Prospectre
cobblemon.species.skideer.name: Skideer
cobblemon.species.yuleigh.name: Yuleigh
cobblemon.species.feafurr.name: Feafurr
cobblemon.species.feafurr.desc: Feafurr haven’t mastered the ability to control their fire based abilities, putting their bodies in an imbalanced limbo. Although they seem cowardly, Feafurr will always try their best.
cobblemon.species.vaicear.name: Vaicear
cobblemon.species.vaicear.desc: With a new found homeostasis, Vaicear have mastered the balance between fire and ice. This apex Pokemon once used their heated claws to traverse through the frigid arctic.
cobblemon.species.phisnooz.name: Phisnooz
cobblemon.species.phisnooz.desc: By waving their trunk, Phisnooz emit psychic waves that can put people to sleep in mere seconds. In a previous time they were the prey of Vaicear.
cobblemon.species.telemac.name: Telemac
cobblemon.species.telemac.desc: Telemac can speak telepathically with other Telemac, allowing them to call others when under attack by a pack of Vaicear. When in battle, Telemac use this ability to confuse other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.macedontus.name: Macedontus
cobblemon.species.macedontus.desc: As an ancestor to Sandshrew, a Macedontus can resist even the strongest attacks. Using their spiky tail, Macedontus can crush foes while defending itself.
cobblemon.species.crynorawst.name: Crynorawst
cobblemon.species.crynorawst.desc: Crynorawst are selfless, thinking only of others in a time of need. In Kaskadian mythology, a herd of Crynorawst were said to have moved mountains using their impressive horns.
cobblemon.species.rotomb.name: Rotomb
cobblemon.species.tamunk.name: Tamunk
cobblemon.species.tamunk.desc: As a scout for Manadza, it prepares the land for summer. It's said to have once been a Chewmunk and blessed with great power.
cobblemon.species.temunk.name: Temunk
cobblemon.species.temunk.desc: After being blessed by Arcitkull, Temunk was tasked with preparing Kaskade for Winter. Its touch causes plants to wither.
cobblemon.species.manadza.name: Manadza
cobblemon.species.manadza.desc: This Pokemon is known as 'The embodiment of Summer' by those who know of its existence. Its sheer power locked Kaskade in a seemingly endless summer thousands of years ago.
cobblemon.species.arctikull.name: Arctikull
cobblemon.species.arctikull.desc: This legendary Pokemon is called 'The embodiment of winter' by those who know of its existence. When its mouth opens, extremely cold fog flows out.
cobblemon.species.wicoot.name: Wicoot
cobblemon.species.wicoot.desc: This mythical Pokemon is cunning and intelligent, although these skills are mostly used to play pranks on others. Even with their mischievous demeanor, Wicoot is said to have brought peace between a clash of titans.
cobblemon.species.orbtholod.name: Orbtholod
cobblemon.species.pestalation.name: Pestalation
cobblemon.species.revylon.name: Revylon
cobblemon.species.leoseace.name: Leoseace
cobblemon.species.lamentu.name: Lamentu
cobblemon.species.endramodai.name: Endram-Odai
cobblemon.species.neschick.name: Neschick
cobblemon.species.neschick.desc: Neschick can't fly, so they attack foes with their tiny feet instead.
cobblemon.species.phloxling.name: Phloxling
cobblemon.species.phloxling.desc: Phloxling are very caring. They defend their friends with powerful kicks.
cobblemon.species.mosstrich.name: Mosstrich
cobblemon.species.mosstrich.desc: With great power, they beat aggressors into submission with their strong kicking legs.
cobblemon.species.treetle.name: Treetle
cobblemon.species.treetle.desc: When a Treetle finds a seed it likes, it holds onto it for the rest of its life. It doubles as a weapon which they use to defend themselves from predators in the wild.
cobblemon.species.tumball.name: Tumball
cobblemon.species.titanoss.name: Titanoss
cobblemon.species.pepinch.name: Pepinch
cobblemon.species.torpepo.name: Torpepo
cobblemon.species.melauncher.name: Melauncher
cobblemon.species.charrat.name: Charrat
cobblemon.species.charrat.desc: It can take in light from the sun and turn it into heat. When disturbed from rest, it blasts the heat right out.
cobblemon.species.blashrew.name: Blashrew
cobblemon.species.blashrew.desc: Its round body, which has a shell-like toughness and sheen, stores heat that can be expelled at will. Though playful, it can become aggressive in an instant if it or its allies are threatened.
cobblemon.species.explodent.name: Explodent
cobblemon.species.explodent.desc: Its thick claws are as sharp as thick metal. It can fire blazing eruptions of heat from its mouth, hot enough to melt rock.
cobblemon.species.squiddle.name: Squiddle
cobblemon.species.squignite.name: Squignite
cobblemon.species.cephlame.name: Cephlame
cobblemon.species.drimp.name: Drimp
cobblemon.species.drimp.desc: Drimp have a slippery coating on their skin, making foes slip right off its slimy body. They propel themselves across the ocean floor using their fan-like tail.
cobblemon.species.prawnee.name: Prawnee
cobblemon.species.prawnee.desc: Prawnee are very mischievous and always happy. Playfully, they throw around foes while laughing.
cobblemon.species.fabulusk.name: Fabulusk
cobblemon.species.fabulusk.desc: Fabulusk are filled with pride and vain. They will even go as far as taking a swipe at their trainers if they insult their appearance.
cobblemon.species.cheekii.name: Cheekii
cobblemon.species.cheekii.desc: Cheekii have pouches inside of their cheeks in which they store berries and nuts. A single Cheekii can collect up to 150 berries in one day.
cobblemon.species.grumpster.name: Grumpster
cobblemon.species.grumpster.desc: A leading Grumpster can direct a horde of up to 35 Cheekii to forage berries and nuts for itself. It sleeps the majority of the day sometimes blocking paths on routes.
cobblemon.species.ferasquab.name: Ferasquab
cobblemon.species.ferasquab.desc: Cherm and Cherrish are Ferasquab's favourite meal. It uses its sharp beak to sniff out the sweetest Cherm.
cobblemon.species.streedove.name: Streedove
cobblemon.species.urbigeon.name: Urbigeon
cobblemon.species.principillar.name: Principillar
cobblemon.species.kookoon.name: Kookoon
cobblemon.species.fluttereign.name: Fluttereign
cobblemon.species.larvake.name: Larvake
cobblemon.species.larvake.desc: With their large antennae, they scare off any predators who think they are dangerous dragons.
cobblemon.species.mockoon.name: Mockoon
cobblemon.species.mockoon.desc: Upon evolution, Larvake develop a strong outer shell which protects them from being eaten. They mimic a dragon's mouth to scare off foes.
cobblemon.species.mimoth.name: Mimoth
cobblemon.species.mimoth.desc: Mimoth's colouring and shape mimic ferocious dragons to scare away potential predators.
cobblemon.species.cherm.name: Cherm
cobblemon.species.cherm.desc: Often hunted by hungry predators, Cherm releases a sweet aroma from its body. The leaf on its head can be used to make tea.
cobblemon.species.cherrish.name: Cherrish
cobblemon.species.cherrish.desc: Cherrish's two heads work together in perfect unison. At night time, they hang from tall branches and sleep peacefully out of reach from any hungry Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.denshirui.name: Denshirui
cobblemon.species.denshirui.desc: Denshirui store large amounts of electric energy in its cheeks, which it then fires out through its tail when threatened.
cobblemon.species.melabuzz.name: Melabuzz
cobblemon.species.mieltz.name: Mieltz
cobblemon.species.mieltzar.name: Mieltzar
cobblemon.species.budcheep.name: Budcheep
cobblemon.species.budcheep.desc: Budcheep are very friendly and common house pets. They come in many different colours.
cobblemon.species.paratweet.name: Paratweet
cobblemon.species.paratweet.desc: Dual WingbeatSTAB Flying Tailwind Flying Helping Hand Normal SnoreSTAB Normal UproarSTAB Normal Thunderbolt Electric Thunder Wave Electric Play Rough Fairy Sunny Day Fire Shadow Claw Ghost Bullet Seed Grass Ice Beam Ice Attract Normal Body SlamSTAB Normal Confide Normal CutSTAB Normal Double Team Normal Double-EdgeSTAB Normal Echoed VoiceSTAB Normal FacadeSTAB Normal False SwipeSTAB Normal FrustrationSTAB Normal Giga ImpactSTAB Normal Heartfelt PulseSTAB Normal Hidden PowerSTAB Normal Hyper BeamSTAB Normal Protect Normal Psych Up Normal ReturnSTAB Normal RoundSTAB Normal Safeguard Normal Sleep Talk Normal StrengthSTAB Normal Substitute Normal Swagger Normal Toxic Poison Rest Psychic Steel Wing Steel
cobblemon.species.pinksqueek.name: Pinksqueek
cobblemon.species.pinkaboo.name: Pinkaboo
cobblemon.species.stalittle.name: Stalittle
cobblemon.species.stalittle.desc: Sturdy Pokemon that hide in caves full of mineral-rich water. The rocky spikes on their bodies are deposits of this water.
cobblemon.species.sedinane.name: Sedinane
cobblemon.species.sedinane.desc: Their hair is thick and coarse, commonly getting small rocks and other debris caught in it. Sedinane love to chew on these rocks.
cobblemon.species.carrauntain.name: Carrauntain
cobblemon.species.carrauntain.desc: With powerful jaws and thick, durable legs, this Pokemon is a force to be reckoned with if you step foot in its territory.
cobblemon.species.tuburrow.name: Tuburrow
cobblemon.species.tuburrow.desc: Tuburrow live in caves. They dig elaborate and complex tunnels using their rocky tails.
cobblemon.species.tunnelurm.name: Tunnelurm
cobblemon.species.tunnelurm.desc: With its powerful drill on its head, it powers through even the strongest of metals. They have been found to dig up to 8 kilometers into the earth.
cobblemon.species.audibat.name: Audibat
cobblemon.species.audibat.desc: Playful but mischevous, it's known to fly out of caves at night to mess with unsuspecting Cherm. Its cry can be heard from nearly a mile away.
cobblemon.species.chiraudio.name: Chiraudio
cobblemon.species.echolocave.name: Echolocave
cobblemon.species.echolocave.desc: - Supersonic Normal - Scratch Normal - Screech Normal - Astonish Ghost 9 BiteSTAB Dark 12 Wing AttackSTAB Flying 15 Flatter Dark 18 Feint AttackSTAB Dark 21 Echolocate Normal 24 Echoed Voice Normal 27 Air CutterSTAB Flying 30 Snatch Dark 33 Round Normal 36 Embargo Dark 39 Beat UpSTAB Dark 44 Air SlashSTAB Flying 49 Jumpscare Ghost 53 Drain LifeSTAB Dark 57 Aerial AceSTAB Flying 61 Parting Shot Dark 65 Throat ChopSTAB Dark 69 WindblastSTAB Flying

cobblemon.species.scruffur.name: Scruffur
cobblemon.species.olynx.name: Olynx
cobblemon.species.hairibble.name: Hairibble
cobblemon.species.furrocious.name: Furrocious
cobblemon.species.furrocious.desc: - Sand Attack Ground - Jab Normal - Leer Normal - Poison StingSTAB Poison - Scary Face Normal - Pinch Bug - Acupressure Normal - Spikes Ground - Toxic Spikes Poison - Toxic Poison 6 Bide Normal 11 Sand TombSTAB Ground 14 Bite Dark 18 Slash Normal 21 Prickle BarbsSTAB Poison 25 MagnitudeSTAB Ground 27 Bug Bite Bug 29 DigSTAB Ground 31 Toxic Thread Poison 33 Fell Stinger Bug 35 BulldozeSTAB Ground 37 Cross PoisonSTAB Poison 41 Hair Sweep Psychic 44 LandslideSTAB Ground 47 Poison FangSTAB Poison 51 Night Slash Dark 54 Poison JabSTAB Poison 57 Corrosive BiteSTAB Poison 59 EarthquakeSTAB Ground 63 Gunk ShotSTAB Poison 66 Stomping TantrumSTAB Ground 71 Thrash Normal
cobblemon.species.glyptic.name: Glyptic
cobblemon.species.glyptic.desc: Glyptic are filled with mysterious power. They live in desert ruins.
cobblemon.species.buttereef.name: Buttereef
cobblemon.species.oarful.name: Oarful
cobblemon.species.pyrant.name: Pyrant
cobblemon.species.piluma.name: Piluma
cobblemon.species.killarumi.name: Killarumi
cobblemon.species.metalien.name: Metalien
cobblemon.species.lunetal.name: Lunetal
cobblemon.species.galextrial.name: Galextrial
cobblemon.species.shrimpond.name: Shrimpond
cobblemon.species.pekaboo.name: Pekaboo
cobblemon.species.pitohood.name: Pitohood
cobblemon.species.aviafel.name: Aviafel
cobblemon.species.cursour.name: Cursour
cobblemon.species.frankensour.name: Frankensour
cobblemon.species.halux.name: Halux
cobblemon.species.visiangel.name: Visiangel
cobblemon.species.marshun.name: Marshun
cobblemon.species.brailien.name: Brailien
cobblemon.species.cereboost.name: Cereboost
cobblemon.species.pix.name: Pix
cobblemon.species.pix.desc: Pix are born from errors in code lines. It likes to cause trouble by interrupting electrical signals and breaking computer programs.
cobblemon.species.pixe.name: Pix-E
cobblemon.species.pixe.desc: It is capable of travelling in and out of cyberspace. Large gatherings of Pix-E feed on electrical currents, so they are seen as pests.
cobblemon.species.pixl.name: Pix-L
cobblemon.species.pixl.desc: Computers spontaneously bug out when Pix-L are nearby. Its form is unstable and constantly changing.
cobblemon.species.twinkluppy.name: Twinkluppy
cobblemon.species.notillunar.name: Notillunar
cobblemon.species.rosinella.name: Rosinella
cobblemon.species.rosinella.desc: These tiny Pokemon are very adventurous and tend to be oblivious when it comes to danger. They often get lost.
cobblemon.species.sinsenella.name: Sinsenella
cobblemon.species.dysmerella.name: Dysmerella
cobblemon.species.signapsi.name: Signapsi
cobblemon.species.signapsi.desc: Signal Beam Bug Magnet Rise Electric Rising VoltageSTAB Electric Shock WaveSTAB Electric Pain Split Normal Snore Normal Expanding ForceSTAB Psychic Gravity Psychic Magic Coat Psychic Telekinesis Psychic Wonder Room Psychic U-turn Bug Dark Pulse Dark Embargo Dark Nasty Plot Dark Taunt Dark Charge BeamSTAB Electric Electric Terrain Electric ElectrocuteSTAB Electric ThunderSTAB Electric ThunderboltSTAB Electric Thunder Wave Electric Volt SwitchSTAB Electric Flame Charge Fire Flamethrower Fire Sunny Day Fire Will-O-Wisp Fire Energy Ball Grass Attract Normal Confide Normal Double Team Normal Echoed Voice Normal Facade Normal Flash Normal Frustration Normal Heartfelt Pulse Normal Hidden Power Normal Protect Normal Psych Up Normal Return Normal Round Normal Safeguard Normal Sleep Talk Normal Strength Normal Substitute Normal Swagger Normal Sludge Bomb Poison Sludge Wave Poison Toxic Poison Venoshock Poison Calm Mind Psychic Dream EaterSTAB Psychic Light Screen Psychic PsychicSTAB Psychic Psychic Terrain Psychic PsyshockSTAB Psychic Reflect Psychic Rest Psychic Trick Room Psychic Gyro Ball Steel

cobblemon.species.reneuron.desc: Signal Beam Bug Magnet Rise Electric Rising VoltageSTAB Electric Shock WaveSTAB Electric Pain Split Normal Snore Normal Expanding ForceSTAB Psychic Gravity Psychic Magic Coat Psychic Telekinesis Psychic Wonder Room Psychic U-turn Bug Dark Pulse Dark Embargo Dark Fling Dark Nasty Plot Dark Taunt Dark Thief Dark Torment Dark Charge BeamSTAB Electric Electric Terrain Electric ElectrocuteSTAB Electric ThunderSTAB Electric ThunderboltSTAB Electric Thunder Wave Electric Volt SwitchSTAB Electric Focus Blast Fighting Flamethrower Fire Sunny Day Fire Will-O-Wisp Fire Energy Ball Grass Attract Normal Body Slam Normal Confide Normal Double Team Normal Echoed Voice Normal Facade Normal Flash Normal Frustration Normal Heartfelt Pulse Normal Hidden Power Normal Protect Normal Psych Up Normal Return Normal Round Normal Safeguard Normal Sleep Talk Normal Strength Normal Substitute Normal Swagger Normal Sludge Bomb Poison Sludge Wave Poison Toxic Poison Venoshock Poison Calm Mind Psychic Dream EaterSTAB Psychic Light Screen Psychic PsychicSTAB Psychic Psychic Terrain Psychic PsyshockSTAB Psychic Reflect Psychic Rest Psychic Trick Room Psychic Flash Cannon Steel Gyro Ball Steel
cobblemon.species.brainergy.name: Brainergy
cobblemon.species.primmella.name: Primmella
cobblemon.species.primmella.desc: Primmella are very light and wispy pokemon that are swept up even in light breezes. Often times, especially in rain and storms, they clump together and are blown by the strong winds.
cobblemon.species.primmadame.name: Primmadame
cobblemon.species.primmadame.desc: People try to keep close to them and use their floating bodies for protection from the downpour.
cobblemon.species.primmoiselle.name: Primmoiselle
cobblemon.species.primmoiselle.desc: Primmoiselle are very sophisticated and classy Pokemon, but fierce fighters in battle nonetheless.
cobblemon.species.plasduck.name: Plasduck
cobblemon.species.plasduck.desc: Plasduck keep their feet tucked under their body while they float on the surface effortlessly.
cobblemon.species.fauxmingo.name: Fauxmingo
cobblemon.species.swandola.name: Swandola
cobblemon.species.buldough.name: Buldough
cobblemon.species.buldough.desc: It's beloved as a pet among families of all sizes. Both throughout Nosto and overseas, they're often used as a mascot for bakeries because of their resemblance to certain types of pastries.
cobblemon.species.duggout.name: Duggout
cobblemon.species.duggout.desc: The largest head decides where the team goes. They work cooperatively to drill powerfully through tough ground.
cobblemon.species.seasaw.name: Seasaw
cobblemon.species.chainjaw.name: Chainjaw
cobblemon.species.atlarv.name: Atlarv
cobblemon.species.atlagon.name: Atlagon
cobblemon.species.pigstyk.name: Pigstyk
cobblemon.species.lumboar.name: Lumboar
cobblemon.species.hogstead.name: Hogstead
cobblemon.species.planebe.name: Planebe
cobblemon.species.staurbor.name: Staurbor
cobblemon.species.mantaqua.name: Mantaqua
cobblemon.species.merineon.name: Merineon
cobblemon.species.teslax.name: Teslax
cobblemon.species.teslax.desc: Their bodies are almost completely transparent, making them extremely hard to find in daylight. At night, however, their multicoloured lights flicker beautifully.
cobblemon.species.zexalax.name: Zexalax
cobblemon.species.zexalax.desc: Specialised cords connect each unit together, forming one collective mind. A strong electrical field surrounds them. Anything that breaches that field will be shocked with huge amounts of electricity.
cobblemon.species.diagem.name: Diagem
cobblemon.species.cephalotox.name: Cephalotox
cobblemon.species.feiring.name: Feiring
cobblemon.species.feiring.desc: If it takes a liking to a human, it will give them its ring and protect that person from any harm.
cobblemon.species.pendelf.name: Pendelf
cobblemon.species.pendelf.desc: It pays close attention to its wearer's heartbeat to monitor its health. It radiates an aura that wards off hex.
cobblemon.species.encrona.name: Encrona
cobblemon.species.encrona.desc: Monarchs from the distant past always kept Encrona by their side to protect them from bewitching spells.
cobblemon.species.tilow.name: Tilow
cobblemon.species.tilow.desc: Tilow produce a small, warm flame on top of their head by using an oil they produce inside their bodies.
cobblemon.species.candhoul.name: Candhoul
cobblemon.species.candhoul.desc: Their bodies are very gooey and sticky. They drip behind them as they walk leaving a big mess, so wild Candhoul are often labelled as pests.
cobblemon.species.chandemise.name: Chandemise
cobblemon.species.chandemise.desc: - OverheatSTAB Fire - Phantom ForceSTAB Ghost - Night ShadeSTAB Ghost 5 EmberSTAB Fire 9 Confuse Ray Ghost 11 Ominous WindSTAB Ghost 16 Flame BurstSTAB Fire 20 Grudge Ghost 24 IncinerateSTAB Fire 29 Will-O-Wisp Fire 33 HexSTAB Ghost 39 Dazzling Gleam Fairy 43 Fire BlastSTAB Fire 48 Shadow BallSTAB Ghost 50 Memento Dark 54 PoltergeistSTAB Ghost 60 Recover Normal 65 InfernoSTAB Fire 73 Perish Song Normal
cobblemon.species.novil.name: Novil
cobblemon.species.novil.desc: It is said that if you stare into its eye for long enough, you will have visions of unspeakable horrors from the past.
cobblemon.species.azatome.name: Azatome
cobblemon.species.azatome.desc: Each book possesses various writings in an alien language, they are rumoured to tell the story of the end of the universe.
cobblemon.species.necromanos.name: Necromanos
cobblemon.species.necromanos.desc: Necromanos absorb people's souls, leaving only the lifeless body leftover. It is said that each soul becomes a new tendril.
cobblemon.species.vaniteeny.name: Vaniteeny
cobblemon.species.vaniteeny.desc: Vaniteeny are very shy and will not move in the presence of another being. They stand very still on all 4 of their legs.
cobblemon.species.boodoir.name: Boodoir
cobblemon.species.boodoir.desc: Now more powerful, each 4 of its separate faces fight for control over what they will do. Boodoir tend to be indecisive which is hinders their ability to battle.
cobblemon.species.maspook.name: Maspook
cobblemon.species.cresprit.name: Cresprit
cobblemon.species.spectmare.name: Spectmare
cobblemon.species.spectmare.desc: - Moonlight Fairy - Cosmic Power Psychic 22 Rock TombSTAB Rock 46 TombstonerSTAB Rock
cobblemon.species.suravi.name: Suravi
cobblemon.species.pzeigon.name: Pzeigon
cobblemon.species.psypole.name: Psypole
cobblemon.species.psypole.desc: Psypole are very intelligent Pokemon that hatch with an orb. The orb helps them learn to control their psychic abilities.
cobblemon.species.telefrog.name: Telefrog
cobblemon.species.telefrog.desc: Telefrog has the ability to use its psychic powers to full effect. To train Telefrog one should do their best to develop a friendship with it.
cobblemon.species.tarotoad.name: Tarotoad
cobblemon.species.tarotoad.desc: When a person is acting strangely or suspiciously, it is a figure of speech to suggest that a Tarotoad is influencing their thoughts.
cobblemon.species.boxeroo.name: Boxeroo
cobblemon.species.boxeroo.desc: These feisty Pokemon play fight to display their markings. More markings are a source of pride for Boxeroo.
cobblemon.species.marsupunch.name: Marsupunch
cobblemon.species.marsupunch.desc: Marsupunch are proud of their scars, and often attempt to flaunt them in front of other Marsupunch. This inevitably results in more fighting.
cobblemon.species.kankombat.name: Kankombat
cobblemon.species.kankombat.desc: Kankombat are intimidating in stature, standing far taller than the average human grows. So, while it is dangerous to get on the wrong side of a Kankombat, it's quite easy to see them coming.
cobblemon.species.seijitsu.name: Seijitsu
cobblemon.species.seijitsu.desc: Seijitsu are pack Pokemon and become very protective of those close to them. They love to run around and chase other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.kousetsu.name: Kousetsu
cobblemon.species.kousetsu.desc: Kousetsu consider those close to them to be part of their pack, and will protect them by cuddling up to them for warmth.
cobblemon.species.mangetsu.name: Mangetsu
cobblemon.species.mangetsu.desc: Mangetsu have evolved to control the harsh cold weather, rather than merely surviving it. They use their sharp claws and keen senses to hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.rockroach.name: Rockroach
cobblemon.species.rockroach.desc: Rockroach mimic stones when trainers pass by. The moment they turn away, however, Rockroach will emerge to follow them.
cobblemon.species.boulderoach.name: Boulderoach
cobblemon.species.boulderoach.desc: Boulderoach chew up rocks to plaster on their shells. They have mined out entire caverns to reinforce the layers of stone and mud.
cobblemon.species.axolil.name: Axolil
cobblemon.species.axolil.desc: Axolil have a petrifying fear of drying out. If taken away from water and released, they will dowse for the nearest source of fresh water.
cobblemon.species.visimander.name: Visimander
cobblemon.species.visimander.desc: Visimander are alert Pokemon, whose sensitivity more than makes up for their blindness. They can physically and psychically map their surroundings in a fraction of a second.
cobblemon.species.webbat.name: Webbat
cobblemon.species.webbat.desc: Webbat's fangs excrete a potent venom, which coagulates blood into a thick, syrupy puck. Due to their small size, Webbat wait to ambush their victims.
cobblemon.species.vamprachne.name: Vamprachne
cobblemon.species.vamprachne.desc: Vamprachne spin their own wings out of sticky gossamer. They store food, attractive objects, and their unruly young in them.
cobblemon.species.cutesnoot.name: Cutesnoot
cobblemon.species.cutesnoot.desc: Cutesnoot love food, and often cause mischief while seeking for it. The easiest way to befriend a Cutesnoot is by leaving out an offering of food.
cobblemon.species.coatisnotti.name: Coatisnotti
cobblemon.species.coatisnotti.desc: Coatisnotti are tricksters who work in packs to steal food from humans and Pokemon. Each pack member has an assigned role in their schemes, based upon the Coatisnotti's strength.
cobblemon.species.ospuny.name: Ospuny
cobblemon.species.ospuny.desc: Ospuny have downy feathers, but rarely make a fuss about preening. They prefer to let their feathers naturally grow and fall out.
cobblemon.species.osprowl.name: Osprowl
cobblemon.species.osprowl.desc: Osprowl practice their flying maneuvers on prey and unsuspecting targets alike. Osprowl keep small collections of objects they have collected in daring flights.
cobblemon.species.ospredator.name: Ospredator
cobblemon.species.ospredator.desc: Ospredator are the bane of humans who attempt to research them. This is because they refuse to let intruders anywhere near their territory.
cobblemon.species.pakrat.name: Pakrat
cobblemon.species.pakrat.desc: Pakrat will live and forage almost anywhere, adding various finds to the pouch of leaves around their middle.
cobblemon.species.bakpakrat.name: Bakpakrat
cobblemon.species.bakpakrat.desc: Bakpakrat are nomadic, wandering the region, so they can deliver mail to humans and Pokemon alike.
cobblemon.species.royalarva.name: Royalarva
cobblemon.species.royalarva.desc: It is said that Royalarva look perpetually sad because they are ashamed of their ugliness.
cobblemon.species.superbpa.name: Superbpa
cobblemon.species.superbpa.desc: Superbpa spend long periods of time sleeping. Even when they are awake, they prefer to lay motionless inside flowers.
cobblemon.species.regalocera.name: Regalocera
cobblemon.species.regalocera.desc: While Regalocera are proud of their majestic beauty, they are far from cocky, spending most of their energy protecting and nourishing weaker Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.carapad.name: Carapad
cobblemon.species.carapad.desc: Carapad use their shells to mimic lily pads. People and Pokemon alike often fall for their disguise. But, if disturbed, Carapad will shoot a jet of water at the offender's face.
cobblemon.species.puripad.name: Puripad
cobblemon.species.puripad.desc: Puripad's air of gentleness draws in smaller Pokemon, who will then rest on their shells.
cobblemon.species.simpaima.name: Simpaima
cobblemon.species.simpaima.desc: It is so often distracted by the light reflecting off its body that it can hardly focus. They struggle to complete complex tasks.
cobblemon.species.arowisen.name: Arowisen
cobblemon.species.arowisen.desc: It is so often distracted by the light reflecting off its body that it can hardly focus. They struggle to complete complex tasks.
cobblemon.species.spidoux.name: Spidoux
cobblemon.species.spidoux.desc: Countless foragers of Vereshad have succumbed to Spidoux's poison after mistaking its abdomen for a Pecha Berry.
cobblemon.species.aracide.name: Aracide
cobblemon.species.aracide.desc: It can envenom the foe by biting or by being bitten. This Pokemon will intentionally leave itself open to attack.
cobblemon.species.mimectar.name: Mimectar
